mapper.select: SELECT r.member_id , e.id as eq_id, e.status_id, i.complete_yn, i.id as insp_id FROM tb_equipments as e LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_entry_exit_record as r ON e.id = r.eq_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_inspection as i ON e.id = i.eq_id WHERE e.serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY r.reg_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_equipments SET status_id = #{statusId}, upd_id = #{updId}, upd_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{eqId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_entry_exit_record (eq_id, status_id, member_id, eq_img_url) VALUE (#{eqId}, #{statusId}, #{memberId}, #{imageUrl})
